long_description: The SkirtSports Cruiser Bike Knickers skirt is an athletic skirt with technical cycling knickers underneath for a modest yet fashionable look when cruising on 2 wheels. Polyester and Lycra(R) spandex blend wicks moisture and stretches with you so you stay comfortable on rides. Women-specific cycling chamois is made with midweight, breathable foam and a seamless structure to prevent abrasion and deliver premium comfort. Compression tights fabric promotes circulation so your muscles won't tire as quickly. 2 thigh pockets on tights hold keys, ID and an MP3 player; skirt side slits offer quick access to pockets and encourage easy movement. Music port below waistband (just above right thigh pocket) accommodates headphone cord so your tunes stay close at hand. SkirtSports Cruiser Bike Knicker Skirt features gripper elastic at leg bottoms to keep hems from riding up. Reflective logos help to increases visibility in low light.
short_description: The SkirtSports Cruiser Bike Knickers skirt is an athletic skirt with technical cycling knickers underneath for a modest yet fashionable look when cruising on 2 wheels.
